Posts.Content: Hi I had 16months off because of problems with mastectomy wound healing. Took 5 months in the end. Chemo was tough before op and then had radio therapy.. Went back to work 28th may2012 phased return, built up to doing I full week and couldn't cope so reduced hours and then had to recuse further. Now only working til lunchtime. There is no hard and fast rule you are ready when your ready. Luckily I have good boss.
Posts.Title: Going back to work

Posts.Content: Feel for you, been there done that got the t.shirt unfortunately. Take each day at a time, wake up and thank god your alive. You will have major melt downs but will be followed by a burst of positivity. It's ok to feel like this and I hope you have great circle of friends and family who are their for you. This makes all the difference. Xx
Posts.Title: I feel Shellshocked.
